description: A photo diary of the fall/winter 2017 collections that were presented in Paris on Thursday.
title: Men’s Fashion Shows: Rick Owens, Louis Vuitton and Dries Van Noten
title_page: Men’s Fashion Shows: Rick Owens, Louis Vuitton and Dries Van Noten - The New York Times
text: Dries Van Noten | For fall/winter 2017, the designer reworked some of his men’s wear signatures, including a khaki jacket, jeans and white shirts.
